c3fa4b5e-3c76-4d49-8e95-3b8c2ef911aa.action: Maybe I can take the ridge path climbing up through the wind. The stones look firm enough to follow.

steps.text: A narrow lift of stone rises ahead. I follow the ridge where the wind pushes at my shoulders.
I trace the line of solid rocks climbing up. The gusts curl around me as I step toward higher ground.

4aa9a0d7-67c2-4d74-9d57-8a7ec8b248d8.action: I could head down this sloping path again. The ground dips steadily back toward the cliffside.

steps.text: The slope eases downward. I follow the dip as it pulls me back toward the cliff.

55fa1272-8541-4e0c-9f96-1f7b7c3f3ca3.action: There's a winding track dropping from the cliff. I could follow it if I watch my footing.

steps.text: The track curves tightly downward. I lean forward and take each step with care.
Loose gravel scatters under my boots as I follow the winding descent toward the lower ground.

e600bb95-892e-4c9a-b26b-f6c7d6b138bf.action: That dirt path rises back up toward the cliff. I can take it if I'm ready for a bit of a climb.

steps.text: I follow the steep dirt line upward. Each step lifts me closer to the edge of the cliff above.

19ee2af7-94b4-4dd2-b60a-897aa3aa7cfd.action: The lane ahead looks open enough. I can walk it straight into the busier part of the village.

steps.text: I step onto the wide lane. The sound of voices grows as the square opens ahead.
The path smooths out beneath me. I follow it straight toward the heart of the village.

6f859f79-46e1-4fa4-badd-9ba1cd2a18b8.action: I could follow the open lane leading downhill. The ground's packed smooth from dragon claws and boots.

steps.text: The downhill lane widens beneath me. Packed earth guides me back toward the stables.

287f4c50-4e55-408a-986b-0bbe79d58bde.action: Those rising stone steps look solid. I can head up them toward the big timber structure ahead.

steps.text: I take the stone steps one at a time. The Great Hall lifts above me with each rise.
The steps feel worn but steady. I climb toward the tall timber frame waiting at the top.

f67a7e87-220f-4f69-be01-9c3cb7047c5f.action: I can follow the short walkway down. The square sits right at the end of it.

steps.text: The walkway narrows as I descend. The square widens out below like a waiting bowl.

e1a5bfc7-d6f5-4ac5-8d1b-84a8a49c3dc3.action: There's a narrow alley here. I could slip through it and see where all that hammering is coming from.

steps.text: I thread myself between the tight walls of the alley. Metal rings faintly ahead.
The alley cuts straight and narrow. Each step pulls the clang of iron closer.

817c031f-a5f4-4924-9fd6-85e5b28a4e50.action: I can head back through the alley. The square should open up once I reach the end.

steps.text: I slip back into the cramped alley. Light spills out where the square waits ahead.

33c1af0c-9f8f-4c7a-8d25-da2951f409c9.action: There's a cramped little passage here. I could duck through it and make my way inside the workshop area.

steps.text: I duck under the low beam and push through the cramped passage toward the workshop.

924fd7a0-d78b-4ddf-b2ea-d71701c3d77f.action: I could slip back through the narrow doorway. The forge sits just past the passage.

steps.text: I edge through the narrow doorway again. The warmth of the forge reaches me before the light does.

d2105cd4-f2f0-4c2d-bdd0-9a5b893cb6d8.action: That covered walkway looks quiet enough. I can follow it straight toward the next building.

steps.text: I step under the covered walkway. My boots tap softly as I move toward the library.
The sheltering roof dims the light. I follow the walkway’s quiet run toward the building ahead.

f866a0b7-bddc-4b70-979f-0f919fe1eaae.action: I can take the back path again. It leads me past the shelters toward the workshop.

steps.text: The back path curves behind the buildings. I follow it toward the workshop’s familiar outline.

ac67a34f-b570-446b-8147-0f7b073d28fc.action: The broad stone path curves outward from here. I could follow it and see what's ahead.

steps.text: Broad stone slabs carry me forward. The arena’s shape forms slowly in the distance.
The path swings wide. I follow the long curve toward the large ring of stone ahead.

8ca4cb55-705a-4ede-b5ee-944a73b8b566.action: There's a main walkway leading back toward the village. I can follow it without trouble.

steps.text: I take the broad walkway. The noise of the square drifts in long before I reach it.

bd59510c-600d-4b5e-a4c1-1f9de1343172.action: A quiet little trail slips off into the trees. I could take it if I feel like heading that way.

steps.text: The forest grows thicker as I follow the soft trail. The air cools as I step under the branches.
A narrow run of dirt guides me between the trees. The smell of sea spray hints at the cove ahead.

b0f9d424-cd4b-47dd-9801-3440cc453fc2.action: There's a forest path climbing upward. I can follow it through the branches.

steps.text: I follow the rising forest path. Leaves brush my shoulders as the arena’s higher ground waits above.
